subject: Re: [junit] Re: looking for comparision of JUnitEE and Parasoft's JTest
msgSnippet: ... That s interesting. Will this involve migrating existing tests for which there is already production code? If so, that seems to me to be a vast waste of
messageBody:
Fazle Khan wrote:

> Not in this case. A balanced review of both solutions needs to be
> presented, we are merging two seperate organizations under one
> umbrella and they have done things differently. With which ever
> solution is decided a migration project would need to be done by one
> side or the other.

That's interesting. Will this involve migrating existing tests for which
there is already production code? If so, that seems to me to be a vast
waste of effort, but then, I've never run a merger, so what do I know?

All I can do is wish you luck.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
